mapper.insert: insert into ParkingSpaceBill( orderJnlNo, userId, carno, spaceno, billStatus, parkHours, unitPrice, budgetPrice, createTime, delayParkHours ) values( #{orderJnlNo}, #{userId}, #{carno}, #{spaceno}, #{billStatus}, #{parkHours}, #{unitPrice}, #{budgetPrice}, #{createTime}, #{delayParkHours} )
mapper.update:
update ParkingSpaceBill
parkHours = #{parkHours},
budgetPrice = #{budgetPrice},
billStatus = #{billStatus},
unitPrice = #{unitPrice},
createTime = #{createTime},
delayParkHours = #{delayParkHours},
where orderJnlNo = #{orderJnlNo}

update ParkingSpaceBill
parkHours = parkHours + #{delayParkHours}, budgetPrice = (parkHours + #{delayParkHours})*unitPrice, delayParkHours = #{delayParkHours},
billStatus = #{billStatus},
where orderJnlNo = #{orderJnlNo}
